content.rendered: PyrAmes CEO and Co-founder, Xina Quan, Ph.D., was recognized as the sixth winner of TEAMFund’s Annual Global Health Innovator Award and the sixth consecutive Female Founder. TEAMFund, is a 501(c)(3) Public Charity and a For-Profit Impact Fund whose mission is to enhance patient access to medical technology in low-resource settings.

excerpt.rendered:
PyrAmes CEO and Co-founder, Xina Quan, Ph.D., was recognized as the sixth winner of TEAMFund’s Annual Global Health Innovator Award and the sixth consecutive Female Founder. TEAMFund, is a 501(c)(3) Public Charity and a For-Profit Impact Fund whose mission is to enhance patient access to medical technology in low-resource settings. […]

Read More…
